answers.answer: Have you been tested for diabetes, specifically hypoglycemia - low blood sugar? Ignoring your problem will not make it go away. Please see your doctor asap.
Certain meds for hypertension can cause low blood sugar especially when mixed with the osteoperosis meds.  You need to schedule an appt with your doc. and discuss.

question: I am a 62 year old female, overweight, taking medication for  hypertension, depression, osteoporosis and ETD.For the past several days, at approximately the same time, I get very shaky,  weak  and sweaty.  After eating something sweet the feeling will disappear.  I have had this sensation before but not often.   Is this something that I need to be concerned about?
title: Could I have a problem?
